profile_about.title: About
profile_about.paragraph_1: My full name is Charlotte Donini, but my friends call me simply 'Lotte' :-). I am a female labrador retriever . I live with my lovely family.
profile_about.paragraph_2: I am very playful with my large size I drop everything that crosses in my way.
profile_about.paragraph_3: I love eating and sleeping during the day, lie in the sun belly up is my preferred position.
profile_about.paragraph_4: Run and walk with my master are my favorite sports.

profile_quote.title: Favorite quote
profile_quote.quote: " No matter that few are your possessions and your money. Having a dog makes you rich. "
profile_quote.author: Louis Sabin
